name: IoTFlows Inc
headline: AI-Powered Machine Performance Monitoring
description: IoTFlows provides comprehensive visibility and valuable insights into manufacturing shop floors. Leveraging artificial intelligence to monitor and analyze the performance of machines based on their vibration and acoustics data, we help manufacturers to identify issues and inefficiencies in the production process and make data-driven decisions to improve performance.

founders.name: Mahmoud Parto, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at IoTFlows Inc

founders.name: Ulises Carrasco, Founder
founders.description: Building the next generation of industrial machine connectivity.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: IoTFlows Inc**

Founded in 2020 and based in Atlanta, GA, IoTFlows Inc is a rising star in the world of industrial IoT analytics. This company emerged from Y Combinator's Batch W22 and has evolved to specialize in AI-powered machine performance monitoring. Their primary mission? To provide manufacturers with comprehensive visibility and critical insights into shop floor operations through advanced analytics that harness vibration and acoustics data from machines.

### What They Do

At the core of IoTFlows’ offering is *SenseAi*, an AI-powered device that seamlessly attaches to machinery, allowing for a hassle-free, plug-and-play installation. This device collects data in real-time, enabling manufacturers to proactively identify inefficiencies and performance issues, thereby facilitating data-driven decision-making. Alongside this, their *Console* IoT platform connects, controls, and maintains these devices, amplifying operational efficiency across various production lines.

Key features include:
- Real-time monitoring using advanced sensors (including LIDAR)
- Notifications for machine downtime
- Comprehensive performance analytics, comparing utilization across shifts and departments

### Why It Matters

In today's fast-paced manufacturing environment, downtime can be catastrophic. IoTFlows provides the tools to monitor machine performance around the clock, helping companies avoid costly interruptions and maximize productivity. The potential ROI is significant: they estimate that optimizing just ten machines could lead to a return of over $400,000 per year.

### The Team

IoTFlows has grown to a team of 60 talented employees, spearheaded by Group Partner Diana Hu. Their collective expertise in artificial intelligence, deep learning, machine learning, and manufacturing positions them as a capable and innovative partner for manufacturers looking to bolster operational efficiency through advanced technology.

### Engaging with IoTFlows

Interested manufacturers can explore IoTFlows’ offerings further through their website [iotflows.com](https://www.iotflows.com). They provide extensive documentation and guides for integrating their services, making it easy for new users to get started. Plus, the option for a demo allows potential clients to see firsthand how their solutions can transform their manufacturing processes.

In summary, IoTFlows Inc stands at the intersection of AI and manufacturing, ready to help factories transcend traditional limitations, leveraging data to drive tangible improvements in machine performance. If you're in the manufacturing space, this is a company to keep an eye on.
